body:
I added my email on my profile page and it says that it's going to send me a confirmation email. 

2 days later, no email, so I registered it again.
...I waited about a week, no email. 
Then I tried it with another email address and still no email. 
And I tried it with yet another email address and I'm still waiting. 

Dafuq?
